nodes.text: A-77 was an asteroid mining facility in the Unknown Regions that was converted into a prison by the Sith Empire. A facility whose security was legendary, A-77 was built into an asteroid, and its location was kept a secret until the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic, when Sergeant Ava Jaxo infiltrated the prison. However, a rescue operation for the over three hundred prisoners turned out to be a trap set for Havoc Squad by General Arkos Rakton. Though Havoc Squad successfully rescued the prisoners, Jaxo died in the process.
A-77 is the subject of the Trooper class mission "Objective: A-77" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released in 2011.
